Package it.polimi.ingsw.clients.gui.view.utils

Class BoardTemplate

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.clients.gui.view.utils.BoardTemplate
public class BoardTemplate extends Object
computes the coordinates of all the relevant elements which should be clickable on the board
